name: It's A Promise
summary:
Erin has gotten used to the monotony of her life. But she still feels like something is missing. One day she is approached by a young woman named Ori who seems to know who she is. Erin doesn't remember her at all... Ori asks her out on a date and Erin finds herself saying yes.

How will the date go? Will Erin remember who Ori is? Will Ori find out that Erin doesn't remember her? Read to find out!
